hero-description: Pokémon-inspired NFT collectibles game made by an 10-year old and his brother.
place-your-order: Place your order for a chance to receive a 1-star beast or more!
store-closed: Store is Closed. Join our Discord to receive drop updates.
place-your-order-date: You can place your order between {{dateAndTime}}
announce-winners: We will announce winners and distribute/reserve/refund before {{date}} end of the day
first-owner-tooltip: First owners receive 5% life-time royalties for every trade of the beasts.
mythic-diamond-tooltip: The rarest beast skin. Only 1 out of 1 for each unique beast will ever exist.
reserve-packs-tooltip: If I don’t win this draw, I want to use my order as a reservation for the next sale.
